div: Probability of population extinction ( η c<0.030), based on 100,000 simulations incorporating the error distribution of parameter estimates, plotted for (a) r max and T, assuming the observed phenotypic plasticity (| B−b| = 0.32), (b) r max and T, assuming there is no phenotypic plasticity (| B−b| = 5.30), (c) γ and σ 2h 2 (for laying date) assuming the observed phenotypic plasticity (| B−b| = 0.32), (d) γ and σ 2h 2 (for laying date) assuming no phenotypic plasticity (| B−b| = 5.30).
